item.title: Indan Public Open Data To Use In Your Next Project
item.description: Will be constantly updated. Send us a link that you think should be added here 1. Smart Cities Tracker 2. Budget Data, India 3. India’s Demographies 3. Villages Data 4. Election Data 5. Open Source Government Data
